title: Special Topics in Community Development & Leadership
description:
This course is specifically tailored for students to
explore specific hot button issues pertaining to
community development. This may include topics
like migration, inequality, ageing, diversity,
integrated care issues, and so on. The module aims
to advance knowledge and skills on key issues of
local interest and aims to offer students a wide
range of topics relevant for students interested in
pursuing praxis-oriented research and service for
communities.
department: Chua Thian Poh Comm Leader Center
